column2: we asked Misty to spilt the check in 3 but she forgot and gave us one check. So one of my friend volunteered to pay and when Misty came back for the check and the card
column4: we had to GET HER ATTENTION again and let her know that it was ready) one of my other friend said "you forgot to split it in 3
column5: you just gave us one check but it's ok
column6: I just wanted to let you know"
